DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety PDC-1421 Capsule healthy subject , find effective adequate dose next stage study , accumulate information possible mechanism anti-depressive effect .
DOC.brief_title: A Dose Escalation Phase I Study PDC-1421 Capsule Targeting Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Outcome measure : Physical examination , Vital sign , Electrocardiograph ( ECG ) , Hematology , Blood chemistry , AEs/SAEs monitor Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale ( C-SSRS )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 2065 year . 2 . Subjects must able understand willing sign inform consent . 3 . Female subject childbearing potential must test negative pregnancy use appropriate birth control method begin study 15 day later end study . 4 . Laboratory data : red blood cell count ( RBC ) , white blood cell count ( WBC ) , platelet , hematocrit , hemoglobin , prothrombin time ( PT ) , partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) , aspartate transaminase ( AST ) , alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , Lactate dehydrogenase ( LDH ) , total bilirubin , blood urea nitrogen ( BUN ) , serum creatinine , free thyroxine ( FT4 ) , thyroidstimulating hormone ( TSH ) level , sodium , potassium , calcium , glucose , within normal range . 5 . No significantly abnormal finding physical examination , ECG vital sign . 1 . With clinically significant neurological , gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , cardiovascular , respiratory , metabolic , endocrine , hematological major disorder determine Investigator . 2 . A positive drug screen . 3 . Any mental disorder diagnose boardcertificated psychiatrist detail diagnostic interview . 4 . Any history suicidal behavior past 6 month evaluate CSSRS . 5 . The intensity suicidal ideation past 6 month le 4 defined CSSRS . 6 . Have receive prescribed medicine , investigational drug non prescribe medicine ( include herbal remedy ) 14 day prior enroll study .
